caption:
Comment below for a direct link to my favorite rotating convertible car seat - the @graco EasyTurn 360 2-in-1 Convertible Car Seat! #ad 

It’s the easiest rotating car seat we’ve ever used and knowing Arthur’s safe gives me such a piece of mind!

Reasons why we love it - -
🤍One handed EASY 360 turning feature
🤍It grows with your little one from 4-65 lbs
🤍Has an adjustable headrest & recline position options
🤍ProtectPlus Engineered that’s front, side, rear & rollover crash tested & approved!
🤍Slim design means more back seat space
